docs.text: Welcome to Musiconnect Visit our website Musiconnect . User Registration In Musiconnect there are three types of users. Ther are Musicians, Audiences and Photographers. To use this system every user has to have a user id. User Registration Example For Login: For Signup: Search All the three users can search for anyone. After searching it will show a result if the user id exists in the Database. If it is not in the database it will show No result Posting Musician can post on their status timeline to let other know about their updates. If any user comes to any musicians id they can see the posts. Posting Example
